definitions.definition: a formal religious or public occasion, typically one celebrating a particular event or anniversary.
examples: the winners were presented with their prizes at a special ceremony

definitions.definition: an act or series of acts performed according to a traditional or prescribed form.
examples: we found a rabbi to perform the ceremony for us

definitions.definition: the ritual observances and procedures performed at grand and formal occasions.
examples: the new Queen was proclaimed with due ceremony
synonyms: politesse "the new queen was proclaimed with due ceremony"

examples: he showed them to their table with great ceremony
